CustomField.description: API name of the field set on the Opportunity object that controls the hover details displayed for an opportunity in the Forecast Breakdown grid. If you do not enter a field set, default hover details apply.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: API name of the field set on the Opportunity object that controls the hover details displayed for an opportunity in the Forecast Breakdown grid. If you do not enter a field set, default hover details apply.
CustomField.label: Hover Details Field Set on Opportunity
